content:
2022-02-11 2pm Eastern Agenda
http://www.hl7.org/concalls/CallDetails.cfm?concall=59753

FHIR-35365 - FormularyItem extensions need descriptive descsriptions (@Josh Mandel)
FHIR-34526 - IG needs a definition of "must-support" (@Cooper Thompson)
FHIR-34527 - Remove most must-support flags on profiles (@Cooper Thompson)
FHIR-32618 - mustSupport elements aren't complete (@Lloyd McKenzie)
FHIR-35366 - Simplify FormularyItem by inlining drug codes (@Josh Mandel)
@Corey Spears Whose issues are whose and what are the proposed resolutions for each?
Per TSC policy, block vote lists are expected to include: issue id w/with link, issue summary, submitter and proposed resolution code
Is this a block vote or just a meeting agenda?
Ah. Missed that. It'd still be nice to see the names on each row, but there's no policy on that.

Correct. This is an agenda for a Da Vinci project meeting discussion to get us to a proposed disposition. No vote will be taken (just reaching consensus to bring to vote with the Pharmacy WG when ready).
A review request (Homework) notice should have been sent out to Da Vinci PDex Formulary participants. The materials can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/download/attachments/90346633/20220211%20Formulary%20STU2%20Homework.pptx?version=1&modificationDate=1644248477787&api=v2
It will be helpful if interested parties could review the materials and possibly comment on them before the meeting in order to help us continue to make efficient progress.

I have updated the original post with names of reporters. (None were marked as in person).
